mdBlocks.parent: Fletのアプリをより「**アプリっぽく**」することができるコントロール、**AppBar**についてご紹介します。
AppBarを使用すると、こんな感じの**画面の上部分に固定されたUI**をつくることができます。

![1000000556.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/8f1dbbd6-79d1-4068-aec7-474ac321d2e7/1000000556.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=eb6bd76a4b736e2f200b5f0df574d9da660daeaacfb352cd027278de90d0da2a&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
インスタグラムのアプリで言う、この部分です。
Fletで実装すると、以下のような見た目になります。
![From : https://flet.dev/docs/controls/appbar/](https://flet.dev/img/docs/controls/app-bar/app-bar.gif)
AppBarは、パソコンアプリはもちろん、スマホアプリを作るときに役立ちます。
# AppBarの実装方法
AppBarの実装方法は、これまで使用していたコントロールと少し違います。
これまで使用していたコントロールは、任意の変数に代入した後、`page.add`で画面に追加していました。

```python
# これまでのコントロール
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# 任意の変数にコントロールを代入
		text = ft.Text(value="サンプル")

		# page.addする
    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
対する**AppBar**は、すでに名前が決まっている変数**`page.appbar`**に代入することで実装することができます。
> ✏️ `page.appbar`は`page`の<u>メンバ変数</u>ですね。
また、この`page.appbar`は`page.add`する必要はありません。
以下のコードを見てみてください⇩

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# page.appbarにft.Appbarを代入
    **page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.APPLE),
        title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.MENU)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.GREEN
    )**

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
このコードを実行すると、以下のような結果になります。

![d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/854aa77d-e999-4ca8-b277-5ca4e90b78f6/d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=bcf7c44ce9ab10e537bc7456da31ef3151d1e164f279f6ddec4dc2a29bbecdf4&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

![ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/cac638af-7f1b-4896-8e31-a5fa903a7f37/ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=0b996ef1a984f511f270f4deca42041f4e8e97d252e94c0390e4f2844c88e2e8&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# AppBarの役割
AppBarには、主に3つの役割があります。一つづつ順番に紹介していきますね。
## タイトルの表示
### `title`プロパティ
AppBarの`title`プロパティに`ft.Text`コントロールを渡すと、AppBarに好きな文字列を表示させることができます。
アプリの名前などを表示すると良いでしょう。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        **title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ae95db3a-37fc-486e-9e70-675a32b6cb3b/0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=024870a9e88e7261cf60d517d22123d4bd257fd5e27c3dff7b6de682a8fba038&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`title`プロパティに渡すのは`ft.Text`コントロールなので、サイズやフォント、色を好きにカスタマイズできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.fonts = {
        "Jacquarda" : "/fonts/JacquardaBastarda9-Regular.ttf"
    }

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=**ft.Text(
            value="Applicarion Name",
            color=ft.colors.CYAN,
            size=35,
            font_family="Jacquarda"
        )**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e1bf9678-b68a-40b8-93d7-0b2a093f5e5b/61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=37d1e7ec2a42cbb45a515da119b78a59f27c64a7593a8b275bb0572ffaff543b&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`ft.Text`コントロールの詳しい使用方法は、以下を参照してください。
[bookmark](https://flet.dev/docs/controls/text/)
### タイトルの中央寄せ
先ほどの例ではタイトルが左寄りになっていましたが、以下のように中央に寄せることもできます。

![center_title.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e56d3a00-57e2-4016-9f36-425965a667e3/center_title.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=391d2765e193fc2b00a2cfe7e8d92ed84b0bcaaa26702cdccd3655b3b9b8cf27&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
タイトルを中央に寄せるためには、`center_title`プロパティを`True`を設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Applicarion Name"),
        # タイトルを中央寄せ
        **center_title=True**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
## アイコンの表示
### `leading`プロパティ
このAppBarの左側には、そのアプリを象徴するアイコンを配置することができます。

![9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/5b4e50fa-d3ad-4575-a089-a21e900514b3/9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=4028db9bb5dea7c822b9927b172290d7ea6a5eb3f5b64c494699b17cbb1c5967&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
この`leading`プロパティには、`ft.Icon`コントロールを設定することができます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
		    # 左端に配置するアイコン
        **leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.TIPS_AND_UPDATES),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
この`ft.Icon`コントロールで使用できるアイコンは、以下の[アイコンブラウザー](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)で調べる事ができます。
[bookmark](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)

> ☝ ちなみに…  
> 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。  
>   
> `leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。  
>   
> コード例と実行例

children.parent: 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。
`leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Horizon"),
        leading=ft.Container(
            content=ft.Image(
                src="/horizon_icon.png",
            ),
            padding=10
        ),
        toolbar_height=70,
        leading_width=70,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

mdBlocks.parent: ## 固定ボタンの設置
### `actions`プロパティ
AppBarの右側には、複数のボタンを設置することができます。インスタのAppBarでいうDMボタンですね。

![%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ba5956d1-8349-4a15-bf28-3820bc6a1bdc/%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=0aea80be388672016630d432b4cb17c86ed1762e4055564945d27cd8665403ca&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
一般的には`ft.IconButton`コントロールを設置します。
このボタンは、**`antions`**プロパティにリスト形式で複数の`ft.IconButtons`を与えることで設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.MESSAGE),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.CALENDAR_MONTH),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.SETTINGS)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarの固定ボタンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![actions.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/81f429aa-2cb8-48ec-b7a7-78fff8764818/actions.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466WCMYCOHO%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T052730Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQDMVCoe8mwj74CSyllsKkGi2OcuUNTEstib1fLCN6mv0wIgfkDFO0Z94TsqvmabtSQ6DAEQD4qO%2BJBuAmFNZrvGhBEqiAQI%2Fv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FARAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMkry3KTPETlEnggQSrcA7Wk31qE5i9qxK741Sbn2qY8KDh3aIfLcA769Iyrc3tsw2YD%2Fh%2Bo1SmhmLteeKCzRbekAEixKzrXp27aDwd2XKQFdopUwuBt%2FTrrVC1OifonW12VYtCh9TPGpzLV1GHRX%2FQuG6Ajn9X4KbPisgKnLD6FVvzBtk4UOBIot6BMqYxeNSSL3feeeqNqzjTT2X7kUpoxQRCHSJuga2iyn6eL2JhvP%2BnoiWLxTzec4Q6gL0zyt%2BpXjuda34KLVqox8%2B%2B2hS0zA6dPu3BmoRBFUtyISJZj%2BNWxnErayE54uUb2Wjf%2Bs%2FxckClQEyIg3GXSShl7LlMJK1CfKdF5jxuvlvU0gwQpybZQc%2BXmPMZVtd%2FyIbEyoFW7Q%2FfFQ%2BvVIn3F4YHWdXGbt21SVEkthiIKPoKUB1ahdvBBlpwLz9IgiDOWJY5wtC51CNADgtmZNqjynL%2F0hTHcfZ6CQiIjzj8aPM9Zhd1haSOInywq547lbRsCpULF4Pw9%2FNeCrFGdrU9IKqXUTFO9IGJ7P0qatpVRVOuLNVwHBsqsWnXUK24QLzDRq%2FstT513kIpr2VJx4OqUGJZRMfqXhR9PSbHU6yq1cEQbD9u3piOByIJniN%2F1jd1DHxKfmMmPJaLf8U3jIxJ1MKGG1L4GOqUBPyPeqQ8XMuCZyDsBEkKTFEzTqoz02V3N%2FvpwjbdL3wHgSoqXevT7FFcadQVk5psL6C%2Fo%2FNn3mb9cklGBVrAPJpQggSda%2BbvZKaGDvJFRRkxfykLAy2rZ7UHzxb1wrOouj5PN2Da6ycBt69G3ucKCY4UOwlNpXo2ap408DovxjbGe5AAlD9WPfFAVVflo0Yr3c%2FMNJsPd1Dy7Tb%2FNZf8wpT9RdRZ5&X-Amz-Signature=f2e5f96aae9a22b90798a7a36b7dacbbb841f9eb78c1e77fcccbdacc152d7fb4&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
専用の関数を作成し、ボタンにイベントハンドラを設定することで、特定の処理を呼び出したり他の画面に遷移することができるようになります。

childPages.title: ルーティング練習問題
カスタムコントロール
